entities.description: The year in which the respondent last worked at a job or business.
Number of whole days missed from work due to injury or illness in the past 30 days.
Number of whole days skipped from work due to reasons other than injury or illness in the past 30 days.
Whether the workplace has a written policy on employee use of alcohol or drugs.

relationships.description: Indicates the last year the respondent worked at a job or business.
Indicates the number of days the respondent missed work due to injury or illness in the past 30 days.
Indicates the number of days the respondent skipped work due to other reasons in the past 30 days.
Indicates whether the respondent's workplace has a written policy about employee use of alcohol or drugs.
